item.title: Iveco Hi-Way 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 28, 2025

Iveco Hi-Way 1.56 ETS2

Features:
– Standalone
– Autonomous
– Tuning
– Accessories
– Own chassis
– Cabins
ETS2 1.46

Credits: jean rittono

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: BXP Russia FIX 156.6 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 28, 2025

BXP Russia FIX 156.6 ETS2

BXP Russia FIX compatibility combo patch
CONTAINS: fix for RusMap, M12 Vostok, Project Russia,
FEATURES: solved missing speed limits and prefabs and models
COMPLETED: removed road connection from Shatsk to Rusmap
INCOMPLETE: none reported
DEPENDENCY: ProMods RusMap VK, Project Russia and M12 Vostok
SPECIAL THANKS: SCS, ProMods, Sergey Zubarev, createdbaness and SaltySeeds06

item.title: Scania Door Opener Mod v1.0 ETS2 1.56 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 28, 2025

Scania Door Opener Mod v1.0 ETS2 1.56 ETS2

Scania Door Opener Mod v1.0 (ETS2 1.56)
Experience a new level of realism with this brand-new Scania Door Opener Mod!
This mod allows players to manually open and close the doors of Scania trucks, adding an extra layer of immersion for roleplay and cinematic videos.

Features:
Realistic Scania door animations
Smooth and stable performance with version 1.56
Works with all Scania models
Ideal for photo sessions and realistic gameplay
Author: Abdoh Ibn Egypt
Compatibility: ETS2 v1.56 and above
Version: 1.0 (First release)
Note: Preview images were generated using AI tools for demonstration purposes only.

Credits: Abdo Ibn Egypt

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: The Godfather’s Freighter T-Liner Skins Pack 23 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 28, 2025

The Godfather’s Freighter T-Liner Skins Pack 23 ATS

This is a Skins Pack for the Freighter T Liner Trailers aka C.A.M’s TSA/SWR Mega Pack / The Godfather’s Freighter T Liner Trailer mod for both ATS & ETS2 and has Real life Companies and Brands and much more with many skins in the pack and high in detail all made and owned by The Godfather’s Mods Company EST 2021. Do note matching Truck skins of the companies and brands can be founded in my Truck Skin Packs and Links to them skin packs as well as all of my skins packs can be founded in my latest American Truck Simulator gameplay i do at my you tube channel Australia Worldwide Entertainment and also at the community area of the you tube channel
so Subscribe today and join our over 10,000 subscribers.. Also note folks this 23rd Skin back for the Freighter T Liner has a total of 34 skins..

Do Note That The Back Doors and Side Toolboxes Both Small & Big and some of the roofs are been Painted as well with Detailing.

Skins that are in this pack listed below. (in Brackets is the country of where the company or Brand location is in Real Life Do Note there is some skins in this pack made by me that are Fantasy Companies just for fun)
– 1st Fleet Haulage (Australia)
– AirRoad Group (Australia)
– Ansett Freight Express (Australia)
– Ausway Transport (Australia)
– Carways (Australia)
– Colgate (USA)
– Craig Arthur Transport (White & Blue Skin) (Australia)
– Dennis Transport (Australia)
– FCN Operations Pty Ltd (Australia)
– GTS Freight Management (Australia)
– Guilford General Transport (Australia)
– Iman Logistics (Australia)
– Kimba Transport (Australia)
– Land Transport (Australia)
– Maloney Transport (Australia)
– McBride Transport Traralgon (Australia)
– Mchaffie Transport (Australia)
– Medlog Transport & Logistics (Australia)
– Obrienco Transport (Australia)
– P3 Transport Australia (Australia)
– RE Downes Pty Ltd (Australia)
– Rocket Industries (Australia)
– Saxbys Soft Drinks Ginger Beer (Australia)
– SGA Logistics (Australia)
– SRV Road Freight Services (The Replacement) (Australia)
– Statewide Freight (Australia)
– Sunshine Sugar (Australia)
– Tony Innaimo Transport 30th Annniversary (Australia)
– Winning Services (Australia)
– Winston Express Haulage (5 Skin Designs) (Australia)

All Company’s and Brands used in this mod is only for entertainment use so do understand and enjoy.

Other The Godfather’s Freighter T-Liner Trailer Skins Pack can be Downloaded at ATS Mod sites that have The Godfather’s Mods Company Mods for ATS and 100% free to download..

Credits: The Godfather's Mods Company EST 2021 Australia Worldwide Entertainment You Tube Channel for ATS Gameplay of my upcoming skins

item.title: Colored Background Map for v1.1.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | October 28, 2025

Colored Background Map for v1.1.0 ATS

This mod adds a colored background map for ATS

Correctly show colors for underground warehouses (instead of white)
Correctly place background map accordingly to Atlantic Canada and Alaska – North to the Future
Show major rivers and lakes
Show Hawaii and Palau

Adjustments in Carrabean Islands
Adjustments in Aleutian Islands
Adds map camera limits

Credits: Rxx2008
